refnamediv.refpurpose: convert wiki-formated text to latex-beamer code

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: FILE - the text-file to be processed

refsect1.title: Usage
refsect1.para: usually you want to pipe the output of wiki2beamer into a file:

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: Wiki2beamer has it's own syntax, everything that is unknown will be passed through to the LaTeX output (unless inside special environments).
